message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $20000?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob, but I'm afraid $15000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $18000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $16000?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $17000? I think that's a fair price for this high-end product
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $16500?
